meanings.meaning: money paid into a bank account

examples: Building society deposits have increased by 2.3%.

meanings.meaning: money which is the first payment for sth

examples: We've put down the deposit on our new car.

meanings.meaning: money paid when you rent sth

examples: All deposits for holiday cottages are refundable.
You have to pay a deposit of
100 as well as two months' rent.
You'll get back your deposit once we've checked the bikes are all right.
If furniture is damaged, you will forfeit your deposit.
The floods left a thick deposit of mud over the fields.
an area with large mineral deposits
The region has many deposits of valuable oil.
